title: U.S., Qatar days away from final agreement on Air Force One gift
summary: The Trump administration is diverting funds from the Pentagon’s budget–possibly from the Department of Defense’s nuclear modernization initiative–to retrofit his Qatari jumbo jet so it can operate as Air Force One
